name: Bird dash (XGgamer)
description:
Recoil op in the chat I guess........

scratch - https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/625869057/

-------------------------------Bird dash-----------------------------

1: For movement the gun has recoil so just point in the opposite of where you wanna go and it will soot bullets and give you recoil.

2: If you go to right edge you get instantly teleported to another

3: Don't touch rockets and don't go down the edge.

4: Whenever a missile goes down you gain a point

-------------------------------------------------------------------------

Music - To wherever

Idea - 100% by me

-------------------------------------------------------------------------

This is just a small game but I hope you like it!
